channel.title: Website devolopeer
channel.description:
Hey, I am the owner of PerfectionX 667/718. We are working hard and getting the server up to play as soon as possible
I do NOT have time to be messing with the website, ect. I would like to find someone who is good in doing ALL of this. After you finish, it will pretty much be easy for you from there. I want to basically have a forum home page. Sometime where the forums are the home page when you time the site in the address bar.
You will be ranked ingame, and have rights. I assure you of this. Please speak to me if you are interested!
Skype: helprsps
